title: Suisai Beauty Clear Powder Wash N 15 pcs
description: SUISAI Beauty Clear Powder Wash N a unique powder format that activates when in contact with water, and transforms into a foamy and effervescent cleanser. Deep cleanses pores from dirt and toxins, removes dead skin cells for a smooth and more radiant complexion while hydrating the skin. The facial wash contains proteolytic enzyme (Protease) lipolytic enzyme (Lipase) and amino acid-based cleansing ingredients (Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate Sodium Myristoyl Glutamate) to break down impurities and sebum. This is an upgrade from the original version with two new ingredients Ethyl Glucoside and Sodium Hyaluronate for enhanced moisturizing effects
